- Floor type: Oak-pattern engineered hardwood / laminate planks; visible tongue-and-groove seams.  
- Damage: Two damaged planks with chipped veneer and exposed substrate; large area near center-left shows delamination.  
- Condition: Veneer delamination and possible moisture or impact damage; edges appear lifted.  
- Location: Main living area floor surface (interior).  
- Recommendation: Replace the affected planks; investigate moisture source and subfloor condition; taper or reseal as needed; temporary trip hazard until repaired.
